properties.name: mybatis-flex.lazy-initialization
properties.description: Set whether enable lazy initialization for mapper bean.

properties.name: mybatis-flex.mapper-default-scope
properties.description: A default scope for mapper bean that scanned by auto-configure.

properties.name: mybatis-flex.inject-sql-session-on-mapper-scan
properties.description: Set whether inject a SqlSessionTemplate or SqlSessionFactory bean (If you want to back to the behavior of 2.2.1 or before, specify false). If you use together with spring-native, should be set true.

deprecation.reason: The 'userdirective' is deprecated since Velocity 2.x. This property defined for keeping backward compatibility with older velocity version.

properties.name: mybatis-flex.global-config.normal-value-of-logic-delete
properties.description: 逻辑删除未删除值标记

properties.name: mybatis-flex.global-config.deleted-value-of-logic-delete
properties.description: 逻辑删除已删除值标记
